alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 12:56PM MST until July 23 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County near Cedar Mountain Heights in north central Arizona... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 1255 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Williams...drifting to the west at around 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will impact areas near Cedar Mountain Heights and Red Lake This includes State Route 64 between mile markers 188 and 201. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall may result in flooding, especially across low-lying and poor drainage areas.
